name: Lords of Magic: Special Edition
description: Urak, once peaceful, is now a land of darkness, chaos and death. The people yearn for a champion to drive away the forces of evil. That champion is you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10 Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NNVidia/ATI 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 with Hardware T&L support (compatible with DirectX 9 recommended) Storage: 600 MB available space
